ygData.subject: RE: Petition to replace level 14 song
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I have to respectfully disagree with this idea, I would rather have all the songs we already have actually do something and do it the way they are
ygData.messageBody:
Well I have to respectfully disagree with this idea, I would rather have all
the songs we already have actually do something and do it the way they are
supposed to (ha!) than start trying to petition about changing one that at
least works and does something, even if that something is somewhat rarely
useful at this time.

I have been and am still concerned about two things:

1) Make our existing songs all work the way they should. Nuff said.

2) Increase our bad skill caps. I don't think "master of none" necessarily
means crummy at most! All secondary skills should cap somewhere between
above average and just below Master. I really think our secondary skills
should cap at 100, the last point of "Excellent" before you reach "Master"
and halfway to the 200 "double master" that others get as a cap.

There are many reasons why #2 should really be addressed that we have all
discovered throughout the course of our playing since Final release and some
have only become more obvious over time, after other game changes, and as
more players go beyond their skill caps points in level.

- Faras Tar'Linedhel
E'ci
